patient_info: Cholecystitis,Cerebral hemorrhage,Ascites,Abnormal mitral valve morphology,Cardiomegaly,Pericardial effusion,Abnormal tricuspid valve morphology,Right ventricular failure,Accessory spleen,Abdominal pain,Pulmonary arterial hypertension,Dyspnea,Pleural effusion,Sparse scalp hair,Hepatomegaly,Conjugated hyperbilirubinemia,Generalized muscle weakness,Exercise intolerance,Increased total bilirubin,Permanent atrial fibrillation,Pulmonary artery dilatation,Abnormal vena cava morphology,Reduced systolic function,Pedal edema,Decreased urine output,Reduced left ventricular ejection fraction,Left ventricular diastolic dysfunction,Right atrial enlargement,Increased circulating NT-proBNP concentration,Left atrial enlargement
golden_diagnosis: Cardiomyopathy, familial restrictive, 1,家族性/特发性限制型心肌病/Familial/Idiopathic restrictive cardiomyopathy,Cardiomyopathy, familial restrictive, 3,Cardiomyopathy, dilated, 1KK,Cardiomyopathy, familial hypertrophic, 26
predict_diagnosis:
1. Primary biliary cholangitis (PBC) with secondary胆管炎 and liver cirrhosis leading to cerebral hemorrhage and ascites
2. Mitochondrial encephalomyopathy with stroke-like episodes (MELAS) and dilated cardiomyopathy
3. Familial international normalized ratio (FIRN) disorder with abnormal mitral and tricuspid valve morphology, cardiomegaly, and right ventricular failure
4. Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) with nephrotic syndrome, neuroticulate symptoms, and splenomegaly
5. Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) with pelvic pain, hypertriglyceridemia, and abnormal scalp hair
6. Congenital heart disease with triposidinic truncus arteriosus, right ventricular hypoplasia, and abnormal mitral and tricuspid valve morphology
7. Bacterial endocarditis with pericardial effusion, tachycardia, and right ventricular failure
8. Viral trigeminal neuralgia with facial pain,uralaema, and increased total bilirubin
9. Hypersensitivity syndrome with renal dysfunction, hemolytic anemia, and abdominal pain
10. Myofascial pain syndrome with generalized muscle weakness, exercise intolerance, and decreased urine output.
